Package hrps.boundary

Class ReservationUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrps.boundary.ReservationUI
  • public class ReservationUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for displaying the UI when making reservation, including creating (includes walk-in), updating, removing and printing reservations.
    Author:
    Peng Wenxuan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.Scanner in
      The only scanner used for this UI.
      private static ReservationUI instance
      Static ReservationUI instance to be used by other classes to call ReservationUI's methods.
      private static boolean isBookOnline
      Define BOOK reserving type.
      private static boolean isWalkIn
      Define WALK IN reserving type.
      private ReservationController reservationController
      Use ReservationController to access and update reservations' data.

      private ReservationUI()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation from other classes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void cancelExpiredReservation​(Reservation reservation)
      Cancel a certain reservation if a guest wants to cancel it before checking in or does not check in by his confirmed check in time, the released room will be automatically assigned to a future-reserved reservation or a waitList reservation, the expired reservation will be removed from the reservation list.
      private void checkInReservation​(Reservation reservation)
      Check in reservation by guest contact, note that if actual check in date time is later than confirmed check in date time for more than 24 hours, the reservation will expire.
      private boolean checkRoomNumInAvailableList​(java.util.List<Room> roomList, java.lang.String roomNum)
      Check if a room number (as a String) actually represents an existing room.
      private void createWalkInReservation()
      Get a valid contact number from user and start the UI for creating reservation with reserving mode WALK_IN.
      private void displayOptions()
      Display the options for reservations-related methods.
      private Guest getGuest​(java.lang.String guestContact)
      Get the guest with the specified guest's contact, if no guest with that contact, call the creating new guest UI to create a new guest with that contact from GuestUI.
      static ReservationUI getInstance()
      Get the UI instance, or create new one if no UI was instantiated.

      Iteratively asks for user input until a valid formatted date time is entered.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ReservationUI getInstance()
        Get the UI instance, or create new one if no UI was instantiated. This helps prevent multiple instantiations of UI which is unnecessary.
        Returns:
        The singleton ReservationUI instance ready to be used to call methods of ReservationUI class.

      • displayOptions

        private void displayOptions()
        Display the options for reservations-related methods.

      • run

        void run()
        Start the displaying and interfacing procedure.

      • createWalkInReservation

        private void createWalkInReservation()
        Get a valid contact number from user and start the UI for creating reservation with reserving mode WALK_IN.

      • getValidGuestContact

        private java.lang.String getValidGuestContact()
        Iteratively asks for user input until a valid contact number is entered.
        Returns:
        A String representing a valid contact number.

      • newReservationUI

        private void newReservationUI​(java.lang.String guestContact,
                              boolean isBookOnline)
                       throws HRPSException
        Display the UI for reading user's inputs to creating a new reservation. If no room is vacant in the user's checkin-checkout period, user could still put a waitlisted reservation which could be confirmed by user in the future if there is vacant room.
        Parameters:
        guestContact - The contact of the guest making this reservation.
        isBookOnline - true for book online, false for walk in.
        Throws:
        HRPSException - If there is 1) invalid date time input 2) Invalid date time pair input (check-in date is after check-out date) 3) Negative input for number of adults and children under this reservation.

      • getGuest

        private Guest getGuest​(java.lang.String guestContact)
        Get the guest with the specified guest's contact, if no guest with that contact, call the creating new guest UI to create a new guest with that contact from GuestUI.
        Parameters:
        guestContact - The specified guest's contact.
        Returns:
        A Guest with the above contact.

      • getValidDateTime

        private java.time.LocalDateTime getValidDateTime()
                                          throws InvalidDateTimeFormatException
        Iteratively asks for user input until a valid formatted date time is entered.
        Returns:
        A LocalDateTime representing the entered date time.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateTimeFormatException - If an invalid date time is entered for more than 2 times.

      • checkRoomNumInAvailableList

        private boolean checkRoomNumInAvailableList​(java.util.List<Room> roomList,
                                            java.lang.String roomNum)
        Check if a room number (as a String) actually represents an existing room.
        Parameters:
        roomList - List of rooms to check on.
        roomNum - Room number to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if a room with the above roomNum exists in roomList, false otherwise.

      • updateReservationUI

        private void updateReservationUI​(Reservation reservation)
                          throws HRPSException
        Display the UI for reading user's inputs on updating details of a reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The Reservation to be updated.
        Throws:
        HRPSException - If there is 1) invalid date time input 2) Invalid date time pair input (check-in date is after check-out date) 3) Negative input for number of adults and children under this reservation.

      • removeWaitingReservationUI

        private void removeWaitingReservationUI()
                                 throws InvalidInputChoiceException
        Display each wait list reservation and ask user on to remove/not to remove it. If User chooses to remove it, then call reservation controller to remove that waitlisted reservation from the list of waitlisted reservations.
        Throws:
        InvalidInputChoiceException - if user enters invalid choice

      • checkInReservation

        private void checkInReservation​(Reservation reservation)
                         throws InvalidDateTimeFormatException,
                                InvalidStatusChangeException
        Check in reservation by guest contact, note that if actual check in date time is later than confirmed check in date time for more than 24 hours, the reservation will expire.
        Parameters:
        reservation - the reservation needed to be checked in.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateTimeFormatException - if the date time format is invalid
        InvalidStatusChangeException - if the status change of reservation is invalid

      • cancelExpiredReservation

        private void cancelExpiredReservation​(Reservation reservation)
                               throws CancelCheckInReservationException
        Cancel a certain reservation if a guest wants to cancel it before checking in or does not check in by his confirmed check in time, the released room will be automatically assigned to a future-reserved reservation or a waitList reservation, the expired reservation will be removed from the reservation list.
        Parameters:
        reservation - the reservation need to be canceled, which is searched by guest contact.
        Throws:
        CancelCheckInReservationException - if the a checked a reservation is canceled as we do not allow a guest to cancel a reservation that has already cheked in.

      • printReservationUI

        private void printReservationUI()
        Print all reservations in the system record. If no reservation is found, display a message.
